name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police report

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Karamay Campus of China University of Petroleum (Beijing) issued a notice that due to the school's network ideological management regulations, all student group chats need to be managed by the school. Class groups, student exchange groups, course exchange groups, etc. require teachers and student cadres to intervene in management. Hometown groups, apartment groups, second-hand trading groups, takeaway groups, etc. are managed by the school security department. Students said that even the group for team building and eating barbecue is within the scope of this notice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up to the March closure of Tibetan universities: After the students submitted their articles, the school directly disbanded all class groups and registered the mobile phones of all students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 2, Nanchang, Jiangxi. Nanchang has been affected by severe convective weather recently, and a number of semi-trailers in JD Asia No. 1 Nanchang Xiangtang Logistics Park were overturned by strong winds.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 2, Wuxi, Jiangsu. Staff at Yanqiaoshi Farmers' Market in Huishan District had a dispute with vegetable vendors in the market over rent. During the dispute, staff overturned the vegetables in the market.
According to insiders, the government contracted the market to a third-party company, but the increase in stall fees after the contract caused dissatisfaction among merchants, so the merchants have always disagreed with the contract, so they put the vegetables on the aisles in the market for business. At about 8 o'clock on April 2, the company staff managed the business on the aisles, but the merchants did not obey, so the staff overturned the merchants' vegetables.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 2, Dalian, Liaoning. Because the school district housing advertised by the developer of Dahua Jinxiucheng Community could not be delivered, the freshmen of the 24th grade were unable to enroll in the Second Affiliated Primary School of Liaoning Normal University.
The owners gathered together and shouted "Leaders, come down!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 3, a gas explosion occurred in a shop along the street in Nanpiao District, Huludao, Liaoning.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 2, in Shanghai, a delivery man ran a red light and hit an old man, then was trapped under the basket. He broke down and cried, shouting "Do you want me to die?" and "Timeout" while hitting himself with his helmet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of April 3, Neijiang, Sichuan. Two girls were harassed by a strange man who asked them to accompany them for drinks while eating supper in a store. The girls were beaten after they refused.
The girl said in an interview that the man at the next table asked her to accompany him for drinks and said he could pay for him. After the girl refused many times, her bestie and herself were beaten by the man.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Children speak without restraint
On April 3, a video of a primary school student's speech in class circulated online sparked heated discussion.
In the video, a child said that he wanted to be the president of the Agricultural Development Bank of China because his parents and grandfather were the president and vice president of the Agricultural Development Bank of China, "so I want to inherit our family property"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, the head office of the Agricultural Development Bank of China confirmed that there was no such situation and that it was urgently checking all its branches across the country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens said: "This child accidentally revealed the national conditions." "If nothing unexpected happens, you can indeed inherit the Agricultural Development Bank of China."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 31, a girl committed suicide by jumping off a building at Wuyang No. 1 Senior High School in Henan Province. According to a description circulated online, the fire brigade removed the school's anti-theft windows to prevent fire and prevent people from escaping. The girl's body was taken away for cremation, and her family did not see the body. They only received ashes and hush money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is said that on November 18 last year, a student also jumped from the building at the school, and the student's body was directly taken away for cremation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 2, Shenzhen, Guangdong. Many owners of Yian Metropolitan Central Garden put up banners on their balconies to protest against the group rental problem and the quality of the fine decoration.
It is said that the developer did not inform the owners that there were group rental houses in the community. The owners believed that group rental houses posed a safety hazard to the community. In addition, Yian promised to give them fine decoration, but the owners still spent more than 300,000 yuan on fine decoration, and in the end there were quality problems. Daily property management is basically inactive.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 2, Linyi, Shandong. The first phase of Country Garden's Emerald Bund project was delayed in delivery, and the second phase was suspended. Not only did the owners not get their houses, but they also had to repay their loans. So they went to the local petition office to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 2, Guiyang, Guizhou. A vegetable fan died after vomiting in an urban management law enforcement vehicle. The Baiyun District Government Information Office stated that when the Quanhu Street Urban Management was clearing the fire passages in the farmers' market in the area, they persuaded Zhou to stop occupying the road and took measures to register and preserve the goods she was selling. During this time, her husband Wang got into the back seat of the urban management vehicle and refused to get off. On the way back to the unit, Wang was found to be vomiting and died at around 12:40 after being sent to the hospital for emergency treatment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 2, a petitioner from Liaoning Province posted a picture saying that her ID card was marked as an "individual petitioner" by the government, which prevented her from traveling. She said that when the staff at the station, airport or checkpoint scanned the ID card using the police communication system, it would show whether the person was a petitioner. Moreover, the system showed that her "contact person" had changed from the police station chief to one of the people she wanted to petition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 3, Wenzhou South Station. Due to the Taiwan earthquake, there were large-scale train suspensions and delays. The traffic jam caused a large area of paralysis, and the public shouted "refund"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 3, a high school in Qingdao, Shandong, had a student protest because the school refused to implement the three-day Qingming holiday. 
The students posted big-character posters on the notice board, demanding slogans such as "Fight to the death, give me back Qingming" and "I want a holiday, if not, I will commit suicide"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@Economistnewusa I suggest that people who have such thoughts should sigh more often about how great it would be if they had the courage of these students. 
Then your lamentation will be mostly solved.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, relevant staff of the Agricultural Development Bank of China said that he was the child of a branch president, his grandfather was just an ordinary employee of the branch, and his mother was a section-level cadre.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 3, at the gate of Guangdong Polytechnic Normal University, parents of students who committed suicide came to defend their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of March 30, a senior high school student from Qiushi Senior High School in Deqing County, Huzhou, fell from a building. The school has not yet announced the cause and the parents do not know the truth.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 3, a fire broke out in the alley near Qianmen

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/PZQrlqmpqw

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 2, Ju County, Shandong. Owners of Haojing Academy protested at the developer's building and sales office because of the price cut of their houses, demanding subsidies for the price cut.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up
The school is Qingdao Jiaozhou Experimental High School, and the students have secured a two-day Qingming holiday.
